eu.df.jiffybox.models

Class Backup

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.df.jiffybox.models.Backup

  • public class Backup
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a set of backups belonging to a JiffyBox.
    See Also:
    BackupEntry, JiffyBox
